name: Operator Overload
description: Operator Overload is a new puzzle game by indie game creator Benn Powell. Solve your way through over a hundred levels of complex combinatoric conundrums using your logical deduction and problem solving skills, and then create your own using the in-game level editor for others to enjoy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit) Processor: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
